column4: can anyone help me figure out why xserver won't let me click on anything in any window, but still switches workspaces fine, lets me type (but not key combo) in xchat, i can maximize/restore but not stretch or move this window
sometimes, if i close all open windows, the next window i open will respond to clicks until i open a second window(or tab in firefox), then everything stops working
is your window manager broken? can you see the maximize, minimize and close buttons?
try running metacity --replace
i see the buttons and all proper WM decorations
it does this persistently after reboots
are you using compiz, or no?
yup
try turning it off
can i do that from tty0?
killall compiz.real or something
search through ps for compiz
killall compiz.real worked
can you hit ALT+F2 and get a command prompt? if so can you do the metacity --replace thing?
do you have another user on this box? you could always add one from the tty, but i wonder if this isnt just some screwed up profile
i'll try that, good idea
okay, nevermind, its something worse
what is this graphics card anyway? ohhh ur on a MAC
is this the Intel graphics, nVidia or ATI
try using the radeon or radeonhd drivers
better performance from that, right?
